ovdesc.p: Defines mapping rules for generation of entry detailed content.
The definition in these records controls how the contents of the accounting entries generated from soft accounting to STMT.ENTRY, CATEG.ENTRY and RE.CONSOL.SPEC.ENTRY are built.

desc.p: The source of the data to be mapped into the associated ENTRY.FIELD. This can be one of the following:
CONTRACT – data is from the contract
TRANSACTION – data is from the transaction
EVENT – data is from the event
ROUTINE – data is derived by a routine (for later use)
Name of the entry field to be mapped. Field name must be valid name in the STMT.ENTRY standard selection record and be one of the identified fields that can be mapped.
Identifies the item in the value source that contains the source data to be mapped. Values should match the allowed list.
